snippet: Antulio Kobbo Santarrosa, who plays La Comay, a Puerto Rican puppet that was the subject of a media firestorm in November over comments he made about the death of a publicist, has resigned from WAPA-TV, the network that carried the show.
abstract: Antulio Kobbo Santarrosa, who plays La Comay, a Puerto Rican puppet that was the subject of a media firestorm in November over comments he made about the death of a publicist, has resigned from WAPA-TV, the network that carried the show.

headline.main: TV Puppeteer at Center of Controversy Quits in Puerto Rico
headline.print_headline: TV Puppeteer at Center of Controversy Quits in Puerto Rico
